snippet.title: Existence: The Outer Reach - Sci-fi RTS/4X Early Gameplay Footage (In Development)
snippet.description:
Download Page: https://jappleseed.itch.io/existence
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/TWtHmEPZbp

Existence puts you in command of an empire that is expanding across the galaxy. Colonize planets by building bases and extracting valuable resources to build your forces. Attack enemy camps to control the planet.

Existence is a blend of 4X and RTS elements that focuses on planetary expansion through building bases and colonizing planets. Expanding to other planets requires a star fleet to move your units and destroy enemy star fleets in your way.
